author: Billy Bambrough, Contributor, Billy Bambrough, Contributor https://www.forbes.com/sites/billybambrough/
title: Ethereum And Litecoin Dive As Bitcoin Falls Sharply--Here's Why
description: The bitcoin sell-off is back, as $6 billion in value is wiped from the global cryptocurrency market capitalization over the weekend...
content: The bitcoin sell-off is back, hitting all major coins including ethereum, litecoin, Ripple's XRP, bitcoin cash, and EOS, as $6 billion in value is wiped from the global cryptocurrency market capitalization over the weekend, according to trading data site Coinâ€¦ [+6378 chars]
